::Spears::

She followed him to the pod.  She pulled out her 3-D hand held map 
and handed it to Ramulas. "This will show you the exact location of 
my landing pod."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus nods. "We can take a transport pod," he says, "Its this 
way."
> 
> Ramulus walks off toward the transport pod.
